revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Reflection Cave |image = [[File:Reflection Cave.png|250px]] |caption = A map of Reflection Cave. |tokens = 555,000 |location = North of Route 11, below Shalour City }} '''Reflection Cave''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Kalos]]. It initially has 100 tiles arranged in a 10x10 square, including 10 chest tiles, 23 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 7,353,000 HP.
== Tables des rencontres == ===Rencontres sauvages===
